text: hello, do you like charities ?
I don't know I haven't found anyone good ones
do you know save the children charity ?
No, I have never hear of it
some info about save the children,they are a non-profit organisation who help children in the world, what you think now about this organization ?
Do they help children right here in America
they help children in america to, whenever is needed, they helped Hawaii too, with hurricane lane .
That is awesome. I am more willing to help a charity that will help right here in America
this is a charity in america too, are you willing to donate some of your money in the end of the survey?
I would like to, but I really can afford to donate anything right now.
but they are not your money , some of the hit winning, if you like too.
I don't understand what you mean
well do you have faith in this kind of organizations?
Yes, it sounds like a good charity.
do you ever heard something bad about this kind of charities ?
Yes, I have. Some don't give the money out like they are suppose to.
did you heard that they now do every payment taken from people transparet?
No, I have not hear that
at last , how much are you willing to donate in the end of the survey? you can donate as much money you want because they really are not real money, you can make a good impression for future hits.
How does me saying I will donate fake money make a good impression for future hits.
you would help me , thank you for your conversation
